label: ball
caption: In this joyful scene, a lively border collie has just successfully completed a thrilling jump over a bed, its furry body suspended in mid-air as it proudly carries a small white tennis ball firmly grasped in its mouth. The dog's tail wags excitedly as it lands with a soft thud on the other side of the bed, its paws barely making a sound on the carpeted floor. A few steps behind the bed, the room's owner or family member can be seen smiling and praising the talented canine for its impressive feat.
